Get source configuration for a dataset period

Source: R/raw-config.R
get_source_config.Rd

Get source configuration for a dataset period

Usage

get_source_config(dataset, period, frequency)

Arguments

dataset

Character, specifying dataset name (e.g., "key_measures", "activity_performance")

period

Character, specifying reporting period (e.g., "2023-24" for annual, "2025-09" for monthly)

frequency

Character, specifying report frequency ("annual" or "monthly")

Value

List with url, format, csv_pattern
